file_content.text: These people will come around. One way or another.
I destroyed the rebel's supply cache.
Then we're one step closer to ending this pointless uprising.
You've done the Empire a great service today. We may yet see this planet fall in line.
The sooner we crush the rebels, the sooner the Corellians will accept Imperial rule.
Emperor favor you, my lord. Our occupation continues as planned. Shame the locals aren't more cooperative.
Another day, another planet welcomed into our glorious Empire. Pity the locals don't appreciate it.
They should be thanking us. Instead they fight, call us "conquerors," "oppressors."
The Republic has poisoned their minds. But no matter. Their factories are in ruins, their supplies dwindle; soon these radicals will be powerless.
We need to crush them before they rally more to their cause.
The sooner, the better.
We're close, my lord. Very close.
We'll have to make an example of these rebels.
They must be punished.
Agreed. The Corellians must learn the limits of our mercy.
Defenseless prey. My favorite kind.
That'll make things easier.
You didn't seriously expect these people to welcome the Empire, did you?
Resistance was expected.
We offer security, the patronage of the Emperor himself. Far better than the alternative.
It's possible.
Then you don't need me.
They still have plenty of bite. Which is why we must defang them.
The rebels are scattered, desperate, reliant on a few supply caches to maintain their resistance. And we've located one such cache.
It's heavily guarded, but confiscating those supplies will rob the insurgents of much-needed resources. Can I count on you for this?
I'll find that cache.
Watch and learn.
The rebels are hurting for supplies. They won't give that cache up without a fight.
Absolutely not. [Refuse quest]
The Empire needs you!
To the Emperor! May he reign another thousand years!
